document.docAuthor: Apodaca, María José, Palacio, Facundo X. & Katinas, Liliana
document.masterDocTitle: Morphology and morphometry support a single species in the Leucheria cerberoana species complex (Asteraceae, Nassauvieae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Morphology and morphometry support a single species in the Leucheria cerberoana species complex (Asteraceae, Nassauvieae)

mods:name.mods:affiliation: División Plantas Vasculares, Museo de La Plata, Paseo del Bosque s / n, 1900 La Plata, Argentina.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Basionym:
Lasiorrhiza tomentosa Lessing (1830
[published in January; Foster 1962 ]: 12). ≡
Chabraea tomentosa (Lessing) Candolle (1838: 60)
. Type:— CHILE . In arenosis maritimis ad Concon, April without year, E. F. Poeppig Coll. Pl. Chil. I 217, Diar. 162 [ lectotype designated by Crisci (1976: 115) : P, P00732710 digital image!; isolectotypes G00492961, NY00180496, P00732711 digital images!)].

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
=
Trixis senecioides Hooker (1825: 101)
. Type:—The iconography at Exot. fl. 2(10): 101, tab. 101. 1825 ( lectotype designated by
Crisci 1976: 114
).

subSubSection.paragraph:
=
Leuceria cinerea D. Don (1830
[published on May 27; IPNI 2021 ]: 215). ≡
Lasiorrhiza cinerea (D. Don) Lessing (1832: 404)
. ≡
Chabraea cinerea (D. Don) Candolle (1838: 60)
. Type :—Not found.

=
Leuceria pulchella D. Don (1830
[published on May 27; IPNI 2021 ]: 216). ≡
Lasiorrhiza pulchella (D. Don) Steudel (1841: 12)
. Type:— CHILE . Santiago de Chile , Caldcleugh s.n. (
lectotype designated here
G, photograph F 28864 !).

=
Leucheria glandulosa D. Don (1830
[published on May 27; IPNI 2021 ]: 217). ≡
Chabraea glandulosa (D. Don) Candolle (1838: 59)
. ≡
Lasiorhiza glandulosa (D. Don) Kuntze (1891: 350)
. Type:— CHILE . Santiago de Chile , A. Caldcleugh s.n. ( holotype G-DC [destroyed], photograph F 28863 !).

=
Leucheria senecioides Hooker & Arnott (1830
[published in December; IPNI 2021 ]: 28). ≡
Lasiorhiza senecioides (Hooker & Arnott) Kuntze (1891: 350)
. Type:— CHILE . Conception, Beechey s.n. ( holotype E00249417 digital image!).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
=
Leucheria tenuis Lessing (1832: 401)
. ≡
Chabraea tenuior Bertero ex Colla (1835: 23)
. ≡
Chabraea berteroniana Steudel (1840: 338)
, nom. superfl . Steudel (1840) , probably unaware of Colla’s (1835) publication, established this variety on the basis of
Chabraea tenuior Bertero ex Colla.
≡
Lasiorhiza tenuis (Lessing) Kuntze (1891: 350)
. Type:— CHILE . In pascuis steril. Mont. la Leona, October 1828 , C. Bertero 159 (
lectotype designated here:
P, P00732702 digital image!; isolectotypes BAB00000103, BR0000005329878, G- DC00492934, GH00009690, GH00009691, M0030667, NY00180618, P00732703, P00732704, W1889-0291336 digital images!). Other syntypes : Chili, Quillota, in lapidosis steril. coll. editiorum loco dicto la Campana chica, October 1829 , C. Bertero 906 (G- DC00492914, G-DC00492915, G-DC00492959, P00732707 digital images!). Chili, C. Bertero s.n. (P00732708, P00732709 digital images!). Chili, in pascuis saxosis collium loco dicto S. Joaquin, secus flum. Cahagual, October 1829 , C. Bertero s.n. (P00732701, P00732706 digital images!).

=
Leucheria cumingii
Hooker & Arnott (1835: 36)
. Type :— CHILE . Coquimbo ,
H. Cuming 906
( holotype BM000947923 digital image!; isotypes E00413010 , E00249338 , K000504390 , K000504391 , P00732640 , W0017676 digital images!).

=
Chabraea abbreviata Bertero ex Colla (1835: 22)
. ≡
Leuceria senecioides var. purpurascens Candolle (1838: 57)
. De Candolle (1838) , probably unaware of Colla’s (1835) publication, established this variety on the basis of
Chabraea abbreviata Bertero.
≡
Leuceria abbreviata (Bertero ex Colla) Steudel (1841: 36)
. Type:— CHILE . Chili, Rancagua, in pascuis fruticetis Mont. La Leona, October 1828 , C. Bertero 157 [ lectotype designated by
Crisci (1976: 89)
: P, P00732696 digital image!; isolectotypes BM000947926, GH00004651, HAL0112838, NY00163261, NY00163271, P00732695, US 00119991 digital images!]. Othe syntypes : In arena mobili ad maris littus Valparaiso, September 1830 , C. Bertero 1801 (BM000947925 digital image!; [ C. Bertero s.n. ] GH00004652, P00732699 digital images!). Chili, in pascuis saxosis collium Quillota, September - October 1829 , C. Bertero 904 (G-DC00492923, G-DC00492978, GH00260934, P00732697, P00732698 digital images!), [ C. Bertero 905 ] (G-DC00492950 digital image!).

=
Chabraea elongata
Bertero ex Colla (1835: 23)
. Type :— CHILE . Chili , Rancaqua (sic), in montium apricis rupestribus prope la punta de Cortes Rio claro; monte
La Leona
, September-October 1828,
C. Bertero 158
(
lectotype designated here:
P, P00732691 digital image!, the sheet has a diagnosis and the words ‘n. sp.? written in Bertero’s hand [there is also a printed label with the collector numbers 158 and 905, but there is only one specimen in the sheet]; isolectotypes CONC 45146 !; GH00004653 , HAL0112837 , NY163263 , NY00163264 , P00732692 , W1889-0291341 digital images!). Other syntypes : Chili, Rancagua, in pascuis et sufruticetis montis La Leona ,
October 1829
, C. Bertero 158 ( P00732693 , P00732694 digital images!). Chili, Rancagua, in pascuis saxosis,
October 1828
, C. Bertero 158 ( GH00004654 digital image!). Chili, Rancagua,
October 1828
, C. Bertero 158 ( P00732657 digital image!).

=

. ≡

. Type:— CHILE . Chili, C. Gay s.n. (
lectotype designated here
: P, P00732675 digital image!; isolectotypes K000504368, P00732676 digital images!). Other syntype : Chili, 1829, C. Gay 619 (P00732674 digital image!).

=

. ≡

. Type:— CHILE . Chili, in maritimis, C. Gay 345 (
lectotype designated here:
P, P00732712 digital image!; isolectotype P00732642 digital image!).

=

. ≡
Lasiorhiza peduncularis (J. Rémy) Kuntze (1891: 350)
. Type:— CHILE . Provinces centrales du Chili, C. Gay s.n. ( holotype P00732677 digital image!).

=
Leucheria cerberoana J. Rémy (1847: 386)
. ≡
Lasiorhiza cerberoana (J. Rémy) Kuntze (1891: 350)
. Type:— CHILE . In arenosis maritimis prope Coquimbo , C. Gay 264 (
lectotype designated here:
P, P00732633 digital image!). Other syntypes : Chili, Prov. Coquimbo , dans les sables du bord de la mer, très commun, C. Gay 175 (P00732634, P00732635 digital images!). Chili, Prov. Coquimbo , C. Gay s.n. (GH00009683, K000504363 digital images!).

=
Leucheria menana J. Rémy (1847: 387)
. ≡
Lasiorhiza menana (J. Rémy) Kuntze (1891: 350)
. Type:— CHILE . Chili, Prov. Coquimbo , Coquimbo , dans les endroits ombragés, auprès des les rochers au bord de la mer, 1838, C. Gay 177 (
lectotype designated here:
P, P00732670 digital image!). Other syntypes : Chili, Prov. Coquimbo , parmi les rochers dans les endroits ombragés, 1838, C. Gay 176 (P00732669 digital image!). Chili, Prov. de Coquimbo , dans les sables et parmis les rochers, 1838, C. Gay 174 (P00732668 digital image!). Chili, Prov. Coquimbo , C. Gay s.n. (B [destroyed] photograph F 16053 !; GH00009685, K000504380, K000504378 digital images!). Chili, C. Gay 916 (P00732667, P00732671 digital images!).

=
Chabraea glabriuscula Philippi (1856: 715)
. ≡
Lasiorhiza glabriuscula (Philippi) Kuntze (1891: 350)
. ≡
Leuceria glabriuscula (Philippi) Reiche (1905: 414)
. Type:— CHILE . Cordillera de las Arañas, December 1854 , P. Germain s.n. ( holotype SGO 60518 , photograph LP!; isotype LP 002138 !).

=

: SGO 60862 , photograph LP!; isotype LP 75261!, LP002161 digital image!]. Other syntypes : Prov. San Felipe de Aconcagua, R. Philippi s.n. (B [destroyed] photograph F16055 !, NY00180616, S-R-3214 digital images!).
